detector package¶

Submodules¶

detector.Clustering module¶

detector.Clustering.ClusterBoundingBoxes(boxes)¶

Cluster a list of bounding boxes

boxlist : a list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h] (n x 4)

meanBoxes : list of mean bounding boxes of each cluster

detector.Clustering.clusterBoxes(boxlist)¶

Cluster a list of bounding boxes

boxlist : a list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h] (n x 4)

obj : list of list of clusters of bounding boxes

detector.Clustering.enclosed(a, b)¶

checks whether b is enclosed in a or not

a : [x,y,w,h] bounding box b : [x,y,w,h] bounding box

True : if b is enclosed in a False : if a is enclosed in b

detector.Clustering.enclosingBoxes(meanCluster)¶
detector.Clustering.getAvgClusterBoxes(cluster)¶

Compute an average bounding box from a list of bounding boxes

cluster : a list of list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h]

a list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h] (n x 4)

detector.Clustering.initClusters(b)¶

Initialize list of lists for Clustering

b : list of bounding boxes

obj: list of lists
list of lists each representing a bounding box in its own cluster
detector.Clustering.intersection(r1, r2)¶

Finds the intersection of all pairs of rectangles from clusters r1 and r2

r1 : List of [x,y,w,h] bounding box coordinates (n x 4) r2 : List of [x,y,w,h] boounding box coordinates (n x 4)

iou : List of n intersection over union ratios

detector.Clustering.validateBoxes(boxes, imgSize)¶

checks for the boundary conditions for the boxes with the image

boxes : a list of bounding boxes imgSize : w and h of input image for checking the bounds

nBoxes : a list of bounding boxes that are within image bounds

detector.componentDetector module¶

class detector.componentDetector.componentDetector(component='ic', mode='GPU')¶

Bases: object

Component Detector class

component : Name of the component (string) e.g. ic, resistor, capacitor mode : “GPU” or “CPU”

icDetector = componentDetector(component=”ic”, mode=”GPU”)

detect(image, minComponentSize)¶

Perfoms detection of component (slower) Works with images of smaller size for the detector to process

image : full path to the image (string) minComponentSize : the size of the least sized component class

nBoxes : a list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h] of size (n x 4)

detectfast(image, minComponentSize)¶

Perfoms detection of component faster Works with images of smaller size for the detector to process

image : full path to the image (string) minComponentSize : the size of the least sized component class

nBoxes : a list of bounding boxes [x,y,w,h] of size (n x 4)

detector.helperModules.sliding_window(image, window_size, step_size)¶

This function returns a patch of the input image image of size equal to window_size. The first image returned top-left co-ordinates (0, 0) and are increment in both x and y directions by the step_size supplied. So, the input parameters are - * image - Input Image * window_size - Size of Sliding Window * step_size - Incremented Size of Window The function returns a tuple - (x, y, im_window) where * x is the top-left x co-ordinate * y is the top-left y co-ordinate * im_window is the sliding window image
